reference.shortdesc: A navigation title is an alternative title for a resource; this alternate title is optimized for situations where the topic title is unsuitable for use in a table of contents or navigation pane.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Navigation titles specify the title for use in tables of contents and other navigation aids. In some cases, when processing a topicref that has no href, this should also be used as the title of the generated pseudo-topic, if applicable.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.div: The navtitle element is a specialization of titlealt with the title-role set to navigation. Processing is dictated by the rules for titlealt.

section.title: Attributes

div.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and title-role.
For this element, title-role has a default value of navigation.

section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , class, and outputclass.
